hero.title: Nika amandla iKoparetivu yakho
hero.subtitle: Hloza izinhloso zokuSimama
hero.description: Kulula, kuphephile, futhi kunomthelelaâ€”siza ikoparetivu yakho ukuthi ichume esikhathini sedijithali ngenkathi yakha izindlela zokusimama zesikhathi esizayo.

items.title: Ukuhlola kokuSimama
items.description: Hloza izindlela zemvelo, zezenhlalakahle, kanye nezokuphatha ukuze wakhe ikoparetivu esinakekela futhi enomthwalo.

items.title: Izinhlelo zokusebenza
items.description: Landelela inqubekela yakho ngamabhodi eKanban asebenzisanayo, aguqula imininingwane yokuhlola ibe yimisebenzi ephathekayo kanye nentuthuko elinganisekayo.

items.title: Yakhelwe amaKoparetivu
items.description: Yenzelwe ngokukhethekile izinhlangano zamakoparetivu eNingizimu Afrika

items.title: Ukusekela izilimi eziningi
items.description: Itholakala ngesiNgisi, siSwati, isiPutukezi, isiZulu, isiJalimani, kanye nesiFulentshi

items.title: Ikhono lokusebenza ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi
items.description: Isebenza ngokuthembekile noma kuxhumeka kwe-inthanethi kuncane

adminDashboard.intro: Phatha indawo yokuhlola ye-DGRV futhi usekele amakoparetivu kuyo yonke iNingizimu Afrika.
adminDashboard.manageOrganizationsDesc: Engeza, hlela, futhi phatha izinhlangano zamakoparetivu ohlelweni.
adminDashboard.manageUsersDesc: Lawula ukufinyelela kwabasebenzisi kanye nezindima kuzo zonke izinhlangano.
adminDashboard.manageQuestionsDesc: Dala futhi hlela imibuzo ngaphakathi kwesigaba ngasinye sokuhlola.
adminDashboard.reviewAssessmentsDesc: Buyekeza ukuhlola okuthunyelwe futhi unikeze izincomo.
adminDashboard.standardRecommendationsDesc: Phatha izincomo ezingasetshenziswa kabusha zezimo zokuhlola ezivamile.
adminDashboard.guideIntro: Wamukelekile kudeshibhodi yomphathi ye-DGRV! Nawa amathiphu okukusiza ukuphatha indawo:
adminDashboard.guideOrgsUsers: Sebenzisa izigaba zokuPhatha izinhlangano kanye nokuPhatha abasebenzisi ukuze ulawule ukufinyelela kanye nobulungu.
adminDashboard.guideReview: Buyekeza futhi uvume ukuhlola esigabeni sokubuyekezwa kokuhlola.
adminDashboard.guideCategoriesQuestions: Lungisa izigaba nemibuzo ukuze ulungiselele inqubo yokuhlola ezidingweni zakho.
adminDashboard.guideSupport: Uma udinga usizo, xhumana ne support@dgrv.org.

standardRecommendations.title: Izincomo ezijwayelekile
standardRecommendations.manageDesc: Phatha izincomo ezingasetshenziswa kabusha zokubuyekezwa kokuhlola
standardRecommendations.emptyDesc: Dala izincomo ezingasetshenziswa kabusha ukuze usheshise ukubuyekezwa kokuhlola.
standardRecommendations.confirmDelete: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa lezincomo ezijwayelekile?

welcome.title: Wamukelekile, Mphathi! Shintsha umthelela wamaKoparetivu!
welcome.description: Phatha indawo yokuhlola ye-DGRV futhi usekele amakoparetivu kuyo yonke iNingizimu Afrika.

assessments.subtitle: Buka futhi uphathe konke okuthunyelwe kwakho kokusimama
assessments.emptyState: Qala ukuhlola kwakho kokuqala kokusimama ukuze ulandelele inqubekela yekoparetivu yakho.
